entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain or snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow near noon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
